colours.name: Soft Blue
colours.effect: Calming and soothing, reduces stress and anxiety

effectTranslations.en: Calming and soothing, reduces stress and anxiety
effectTranslations.ko: 진정 효과가 있으며, 스트레스와 불안을 줄여줍니다

colours.name: Lavender
colours.effect: Promotes relaxation and reduces nervous tension

effectTranslations.en: Promotes relaxation and reduces nervous tension
effectTranslations.ko: 휴식을 촉진하고 신경 긴장을 줄여줍니다

colours.name: Sage Green
colours.effect: Balances emotions and provides a sense of peace

effectTranslations.en: Balances emotions and provides a sense of peace
effectTranslations.ko: 감정의 균형을 맞추고 평화로운 느낌을 제공합니다

colours.name: Coral
colours.effect: Channels excess energy in positive directions

effectTranslations.en: Channels excess energy in positive directions
effectTranslations.ko: 과잉 에너지를 긍정적인 방향으로 이끌어 줍니다

colours.name: Turquoise
colours.effect: Brings clarity and balances high energy

effectTranslations.en: Brings clarity and balances high energy
effectTranslations.ko: 명확성을 가져오고 높은 에너지의 균형을 잡아줍니다

colours.name: Mint Green
colours.effect: Refreshes and provides a cooling effect to overstimulation

effectTranslations.en: Refreshes and provides a cooling effect to overstimulation
effectTranslations.ko: 과도한 자극에 상쾌함과 진정 효과를 제공합니다

colours.name: Sunny Yellow
colours.effect: Energizes and uplifts, combats fatigue

effectTranslations.en: Energizes and uplifts, combats fatigue
effectTranslations.ko: 활력을 주고 기분을 높여주며, 피로감을 해소합니다

colours.name: Tangerine
colours.effect: Stimulates mental activity and increases vitality

effectTranslations.en: Stimulates mental activity and increases vitality
effectTranslations.ko: 정신 활동을 자극하고 활력을 증가시킵니다

colours.name: Ruby Red
colours.effect: Boosts energy and stimulates the body

effectTranslations.en: Boosts energy and stimulates the body
effectTranslations.ko: 에너지를 높이고 신체를 자극합니다

colours.name: Sky Blue
colours.effect: Expands possibilities and encourages optimism

effectTranslations.en: Expands possibilities and encourages optimism
effectTranslations.ko: 가능성을 확장하고 낙관주의를 격려합니다

colours.name: Peach
colours.effect: Nurtures hope and brings gentle encouragement

effectTranslations.en: Nurtures hope and brings gentle encouragement
effectTranslations.ko: 희망을 키우고 부드러운 격려를 가져옵니다

colours.name: Light Green
colours.effect: Promotes growth, renewal, and new beginnings

effectTranslations.en: Promotes growth, renewal, and new beginnings
effectTranslations.ko: 성장, 갱신 및 새로운 시작을 촉진합니다

colours.name: Pale Pink
colours.effect: Soothes emotional distress and provides nurturing energy

effectTranslations.en: Soothes emotional distress and provides nurturing energy
effectTranslations.ko: 감정적 고통을 진정시키고 양육 에너지를 제공합니다

colours.name: Light Aqua
colours.effect: Reduces emotional intensity and brings clarity

effectTranslations.en: Reduces emotional intensity and brings clarity
effectTranslations.ko: 감정적 강도를 줄이고 명확성을 가져옵니다

colours.name: Soft Violet
colours.effect: Calms the mind and helps with emotional balance

effectTranslations.en: Calms the mind and helps with emotional balance
effectTranslations.ko: 마음을 진정시키고 감정적 균형에 도움을 줍니다

colours.name: Golden Yellow
colours.effect: Uplifts mood and brings joy and optimism

effectTranslations.en: Uplifts mood and brings joy and optimism
effectTranslations.ko: 기분을 북돋우고 기쁨과 낙관을 가져옵니다

colours.name: Coral Pink
colours.effect: Encourages happiness and emotional healing

effectTranslations.en: Encourages happiness and emotional healing
effectTranslations.ko: 행복과 감정적 치유를 장려합니다

colours.name: Warm Orange
colours.effect: Stimulates feelings of happiness and warmth

effectTranslations.en: Stimulates feelings of happiness and warmth
effectTranslations.ko: 행복과 따뜻함의 감정을 자극합니다

colours.name: Soft Teal
colours.effect: Deepens existing feelings of calm and tranquility

effectTranslations.en: Deepens existing feelings of calm and tranquility
effectTranslations.ko: 평온함과 고요함의 기존 감정을 더욱 깊게 합니다

colours.name: Lilac
colours.effect: Enhances spiritual awareness and peaceful states

effectTranslations.en: Enhances spiritual awareness and peaceful states
effectTranslations.ko: 영적 인식과 평화로운 상태를 향상시킵니다

colours.name: Pale Blue
colours.effect: Reinforces inner peace and expands tranquil feelings

effectTranslations.en: Reinforces inner peace and expands tranquil feelings
effectTranslations.ko: 내면의 평화를 강화하고 고요한 감정을 확장합니다

colours.name: Indigo
colours.effect: Enhances intuition and brings deeper insights

effectTranslations.en: Enhances intuition and brings deeper insights
effectTranslations.ko: 직관력을 향상시키고 더 깊은 통찰력을 가져옵니다

colours.name: White
colours.effect: Creates space for new ideas and clarity of thought

effectTranslations.en: Creates space for new ideas and clarity of thought
effectTranslations.ko: 새로운 아이디어와 생각의 명확성을 위한 공간을 만듭니다

colours.name: Royal Purple
colours.effect: Stimulates imagination and connects to higher inspiration

effectTranslations.en: Stimulates imagination and connects to higher inspiration
effectTranslations.ko: 상상력을 자극하고 더 높은 영감에 연결됩니다
